# Denny Ferdiansyah - Senior Software Engineer Portfolio

> This is the official portfolio website of Denny Ferdiansyah, a Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in Full-Stack Development.

## About Denny Ferdiansyah

Denny Ferdiansyah is a Senior Software Engineer based in Bandung, Indonesia, specializing in:
- Full-Stack Web Development (TypeScript, Golang, PHP, Laravel, React, Next.js)
- E-Commerce Solutions (Magento 2, Shopify, WordPress)
- Mobile App Development (Flutter)
- Real-time Systems (WebSockets, Redis Pub/Sub)
- System Architecture and Performance Optimization

## Contact Information

- Email: dferdiansyah2908@gmail.com

- GitHub: https://github.com/dennyferdiansyah

- Location: Bandung, West Java, Indonesia
- Availability: Remote work worldwide

## Professional Experience

### Current Position
- **Full-Stack Engineer at BlueRock** (March 2025 - Present)
  - Location: Australia (Remote)
  - Technologies: Laravel, WordPress, Flutter, NestJS, Shopify

### Previous Positions
- **Senior Software Engineer at ElectGo (Lim Kim Hai Group)** (September 2023 - March 2025)
  - Location: Singapore (Remote)
  - Achieved 66.7% revenue growth and reduced development costs from $300K to $20K/month
  - Technologies: Magento 2, ReactJS, NestJS, Epicor ERP

- **Senior Software Engineer at Halosis** (September 2022 - October 2023)
  - Location: Jakarta, Indonesia (Remote)
  - Built omni-channel chat system with 40% faster response time
  - Technologies: Laravel, VueJS 3, WebSockets, Firebase

- **Lead Software Engineer at Emkalab** (August 2019 - September 2022)
  - Location: Bandung, Indonesia
  - Led team of 5 engineers, delivered 10+ client projects
  - Technologies: Golang, ReactJS, Flutter, Laravel

## Technical Skills

### Backend Development
Golang, PHP, Laravel, Node.js, NestJS, TypeScript, REST APIs, GraphQL, Microservices, WebSockets

### Frontend Development
React.js, Next.js, Vue.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Redux, Zustand, Framer Motion

### E-Commerce Platforms
Magento 2, WordPress, Shopify, WooCommerce, Payment Gateway Integration, ERP Integration

### Mobile Development
Flutter (Android, iOS, Web), React Native, GetX State Management

### Databases & Caching
MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, Elasticsearch, MongoDB

### DevOps & Tools
Docker, CI/CD (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI), AWS, GCP, New Relic

6. **Top Muslim Clothes Brand Award** - Helped client achieve recognition on Tokopedia marketplace

## Notable Projects

### E-Commerce

- Vamosh Group E-Commerce - 300% sales increase

- Flight Information Display System (Golang, Redis Pub/Sub) - Sub-100ms latency
- Omni-Channel Chat System (Laravel, WebSockets) - 40% faster response

### Web Applications
